Address.value: 5300 TOWN AND COUNTRY BOULEVARD,SUITE 500, FRISCO, Texas, 75034, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Comstock Resources Inc is an independent energy company operating in the Haynesville shale a natural gas basin located in East Texas and North Louisiana with superior economics and geographical proximity to the Gulf Coast markets. It is engaged in the acquisition development production and exploration of oil and natural gas. Its oil and gas operations are concentrated in Louisiana Texas and North Dakota.
